title: I AM SO DONE!
body: There needs to be some sort of comp test and net test before someone decides to get into ranked. I am sick of all the people just turning the game into a 4v5 etc. Yeah there maybe ranked games where we have lost because of me but in no way was that me deciding I do not want to play or hit with comp/net issues. I will be soon to be recording all losses and cutting my wrists/arm every time a player just drops out of play.

replies.body:
I'm sick of people qqing on boards.
**f**uck off.
isn't that the only reason boards exists :0 *sarcasm*
***versace versace, eshays lad head on me like im luminarty***
I wouldn't be so annoyed if it was every 1 or 2 games I am left on a team on 1 less person. But it always happens, specially when I am placed into bronze and now trying to climb out.

> [{quoted}](name=Stylin Onyu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0OoFHByX,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-30T07:45:12.105+0000)
>
> I will be soon to be recording all losses and cutting my wrists/arm every time a player just drops out of play.

You're going to die from blood loss pretty quickly {{item:3070}}
